content: I'm actually thinking of getting a new pair of jeans to replace my trusty old Levi's, which I've been wearing almost every day for the past month. They're so comfortable, and I love how they've faded in all the right places. But I think it's time I got a new pair. By the way, I recently wore my new white dress shirt to my cousin's wedding, and it looked great with my tuxedo. I bought it a week prior to the wedding for $40, so I'm really happy with the purchase.
